title: Can I post yet?
body:
I'm level 10 now, can I please post so I can complain about how long its taking me to get games :( 

Seriously, if I can't play I can't get better, and I can't have fun.

replies.body: When posting for the first time, your account needs to sync with your boards profile.  It seems that your thread here has updated your account, and should be able to post now.  Welcome to the boards!  If you have any gameplay feedback, let your voice be heard at the [gameplay boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance).  Best of luck!
